title: EU "well on track" to beat 2030 climate target.
description: European Commission projects 54% emissions cut by decade's end, citing renewable energy growth, though implementation gaps across member states persist.

title: 7 die as migrant boat capsizes in Spain.
description: Four women and three girls perished when their vessel overturned during a rescue operation, highlighting the dangers of the Atlantic migration route that claimed over 10,000 lives in 2024.

title: Massive explosion at Chinese chemical plant rocks nearby cities
description: Over 230 emergency personnel responded to the blast at Shandong Youdao Chemical, which shattered windows miles away and highlights ongoing safety challenges in China's chemical industry.

title: Musk to unveil Mars plan hours before crucial Starship test
description: SpaceX's CEO will detail Mars colonization strategy before the company's ninth Starship flight, which features its first reused Super Heavy booster.
